log.content: I'd like to create a plain HTML site for a plumbing business. Make it look modern. Output it into index.html

function.name: create_file

log.content: This code will create a basic HTML site for a plumbing business with a modern design. The site has a light gray background, Arial font, and a blue title. It also includes a button that says "Contact Us". Please note that this is just a starting point and you may want to add more content and styles to make it more comprehensive.
